overview: The story of WWI Pilot Gervais Raoul Lufbery, a triple confirmed WWI ace, mechanic and world traveler. Explores the Lafayette Escadrille squadron, a formation of volunteer pilots serving in France on behalf of the United States whose service marked the early origins of the U.S. Air Force.
tagline: Before there was an Air Force, there was Lafayette Escadrille.
title: Raoul Lufbery: Fighter Ace
